option.name: originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
updatedContent
originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_bg" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<!-- Profile Picture --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/img_profile" android:layout_width="248dp" android:layout_height="248dp" android:layout_marginTop="76dp" android:src="@drawable/account_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/profile_picture_desc" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Username (first name) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_username" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Student" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/img_profile" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Divider --> <View android:id="@+id/divider" android:layout_width="150dp" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_username" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Events Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_events" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/events" android:backgroundTint="@color/colorAccent" android:textAllCaps="true" android:textColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeWidth="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Letters Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_letters" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/letters" app:icon="@drawable/mail" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:textColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeWidth="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btn_events" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- RecyclerView (hidden for now) --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:visibility="gone" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btn_letters" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" xmlns:app="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res-auto" xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:background="@drawable/gradient_bg" tools:context=".ui.home.HomeFragment">
<!-- Profile Picture --> <ImageView android:id="@+id/img_profile" android:layout_width="248dp" android:layout_height="248dp" android:layout_marginTop="76dp" android:src="@drawable/account_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="@string/profile_picture_desc" app:layout_constraintTop_toTopOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Username (first name) --> <TextView android:id="@+id/tv_username" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Student" android:textColor="@android:color/white" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:layout_marginTop="16dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/img_profile" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Divider --> <View android:id="@+id/divider" android:layout_width="150dp" android:layout_height="1dp" android:background="@android:color/white" android:layout_marginTop="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/tv_username" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Events Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_events" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/events" android:backgroundTint="@color/colorAccent" android:textAllCaps="true" android:textColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeWidth="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="24dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/divider" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- Letters Button --> <com.google.android.material.button.MaterialButton android:id="@+id/btn_letters" android:layout_width="200dp" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="@string/letters" app:icon="@drawable/mail" app:iconGravity="textStart" app:iconPadding="8dp" style="@style/Widget.MaterialComponents.Button.OutlinedButton" android:textColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeColor="@android:color/white" app:strokeWidth="2dp" android:layout_marginTop="12dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btn_events" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" />
<!-- RecyclerView (hidden for now) --> <androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView android:id="@+id/recyclerView" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_height="0dp" android:visibility="gone" android:padding="8dp" app:layout_constraintTop_toBottomOf="@id/btn_letters" app:layout_constraintBottom_toBottomOf="parent" app:layout_constraintStart_toStartOf="parent" app:layout_constraintEnd_toEndOf="parent" /> </androidx.constraintlayout.widget.ConstraintLayout>

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true" android:background="@drawable/gradient_bg">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_profile" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@drawable/account_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="Profile Picture" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_user_id" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PH906-0700" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/white"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Personal Info Card --> <LinearLayout style="@style/ProfileCard" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView style="@style/CardTitle" android:text="Personal Information" />
<!-- Row template: - Label: width 0dp, weight 1 - Value: width 0dp, weight 1 (or 2 if you want wider value column) --> <LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="First Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_first_name" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Last Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_last_name" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Sex" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_sex" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Birthdate" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_birthdate" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Age" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_age" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Nickname" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_nickname" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Mobile Number" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_mobile" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Row: Address --> <LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Address" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_address" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="3" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Caseworker" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_caseworker" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Guardian Info Card --> <LinearLayout style="@style/ProfileCard" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView style="@style/CardTitle" android:text="Guardian Information" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Guardian Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_guardian" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Guardian Mobile" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_guardian_mobile" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Water Baptized" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_baptized" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- School Info Card --> <LinearLayout style="@style/ProfileCard" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView style="@style/CardTitle" android:text="School Information" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Teacher Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_teacher" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Edit Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_edit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Edit Profile" android:layout_margin="16dp" style="@style/ActionButton" android:backgroundTint="#2196F3"/> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <ScrollView xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="match_parent" android:fillViewport="true" android:background="@drawable/gradient_bg">
<LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:padding="16dp">
<!-- Header Section --> <LinearLayout android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:orientation="vertical" android:gravity="center" android:layout_marginBottom="24dp">
<ImageView android:id="@+id/img_profile" android:layout_width="120dp" android:layout_height="120dp" android:src="@drawable/account_circle" android:scaleType="centerCrop" android:contentDescription="Profile Picture" android:layout_marginBottom="12dp" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_user_id" android:layout_width="wrap_content" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="PH906-0700" android:textSize="24sp" android:textStyle="bold" android:textColor="@android:color/white"/> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Personal Info Card --> <LinearLayout style="@style/ProfileCard" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView style="@style/CardTitle" android:text="Personal Information" />
<!-- Row template: - Label: width 0dp, weight 1 - Value: width 0dp, weight 1 (or 2 if you want wider value column) --> <LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="First Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_first_name" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Last Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_last_name" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Sex" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_sex" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Birthdate" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_birthdate" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Age" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_age" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Nickname" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_nickname" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Mobile Number" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_mobile" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Row: Address --> <LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Address" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_address" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="3" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Caseworker" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_caseworker" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Guardian Info Card --> <LinearLayout style="@style/ProfileCard" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView style="@style/CardTitle" android:text="Guardian Information" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Guardian Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_guardian" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:maxLines="2" android:ellipsize="end" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Guardian Mobile" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_guardian_mobile" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout>
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Water Baptized" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_baptized" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- School Info Card --> <LinearLayout style="@style/ProfileCard" android:orientation="vertical" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content">
<TextView style="@style/CardTitle" android:text="School Information" />
<LinearLayout style="@style/FieldContainer" android:orientation="horizontal" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:weightSum="2">
<TextView style="@style/FieldLabel" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" android:text="Teacher Name" />
<TextView android:id="@+id/tv_teacher" style="@style/FieldValue" android:layout_width="0dp" android:layout_weight="1" /> </LinearLayout> </LinearLayout>
<!-- Edit Button --> <Button android:id="@+id/btn_edit" android:layout_width="match_parent" android:layout_height="wrap_content" android:text="Edit Profile" android:layout_margin="16dp" style="@style/ActionButton" android:backgroundTint="#2196F3"/> </LinearLayout> </ScrollView>
